title: WTB: N172 Scott Stratton and Toad Ramsey

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Scott Stratton and Toad Ramsey
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone, I know it is impossible but I am trying to find a Old Judge Scott Stratton and or Toad Ramsey.  It does not matter to me if it is skinned or trimmed or whole.  If anyone has one please send me a message at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks

Tony Turner
